full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I NYAMS LEN MDOR BSDUS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I NYAMS LEN GYI RNAM GZHAG MDOR BSDUS TE BYANG DU BYAS PA 'DI NI, MANG DU THOS PA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYIS 'BROG RIN PO CHE DGE LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG DON GRUB KYI PAR SGRUB PA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,BKRA SHIS, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
